welcome_message_body: Welcome to Mathura, the birthplace of Lord Krishna and a city steeped in history and charm. Get ready to experience the vibrant culture, ancient temples, and delicious cuisine that Mathura is known for. Enjoy your stay and explore all that this beautiful city has to offer!
